entry.title: Queries surrounding Form Language and Form Country/Region

entry.title: How to update pricing conditions of already created sales quotations via API

After importing sales quotations using the functionality of import sales quotation, I would like to know if is there any API that can update the price conditions at item level without the need to change the sales quotation via app?

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Journal Entry Registration in BOI
entry.content:
Hello, I have a question regarding journal entry registration using BOI.

While entries not involving PL accounts register normally, attempting to register entries involving PL accounts results in an error.

How should I modify the code?

Code that registers correctly

    APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_je_deep ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<je_deep>).

    <je_deep>-%cid = lv_cid.
    <je_deep>-%param = VALUE #(
      companycode                 = '1510'
      documentreferenceid         = 'BKPFF'
      businesstransactiontype     = 'RFBU'
      accountingdocumenttype      = 'SA'
      createdbyuser               = 'test'
      documentdate                = '20260122'    " Use today's date
      postingdate                 = '20260122'    " Use today's date
     taxdeterminationdate         = '20260122'
     TaxFulfillmentDate    = '20260122'

      accountingdocumentheadertext = 'RAP test'


     _glitems = VALUE #(
    ( glaccountlineitem = '001'
      glaccount = '0010010000'
      _currencyamount = VALUE #(
      ( currencyrole = '00'
        journalentryitemamount = -100
        currency = 'JPY' ) ) )

    ( glaccountlineitem = '002'
      glaccount = '0010010000'
      _currencyamount = VALUE #(
     ( currencyrole = '00'
       journalentryitemamount = 50
       currency = 'JPY' ) ) )

    ( glaccountlineitem = '003'
      glaccount = '0010010000'
      _currencyamount = VALUE #(
     ( currencyrole = '00'
       journalentryitemamount = 50
       currency = 'JPY' ) ) )
     )
   ).

Unregisterable PL account codes.

    " Journal Entry Data Preparation
    APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_je_deep ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<je_deep>).

    <je_deep>-%cid = lv_cid.
    <je_deep>-%param = VALUE #(
      companycode                 = '1510'
      businesstransactiontype     = 'RFBU'
      accountingdocumenttype      = 'SA'
      documentdate                = '20260123'    " Use today's date
      postingdate                 = '20260123'    " Use today's date
      taxDeterminationDate        = '20260123'    " Use today's date
      accountingdocumentheadertext = 'RAP test'

   "　Statement
    _glitems = VALUE #(
    ( glaccountlineitem = '001'
      glaccount  = '0061005000'
      costcenter = '0015101101'
      taxcode    = 'V3'
      _currencyamount = VALUE #(
      ( currencyrole = '00'
        journalentryitemamount = 10000
        currency = 'JPY' ) ) )

    ( glaccountlineitem = '002'
      glaccount = '0010010000'
      _currencyamount = VALUE #(
     ( currencyrole = '00'
       journalentryitemamount = -11000
       currency = 'JPY' ) )
     )
     )
   ).

entry.title: Chart of Depreciation in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts

I have to create two company codes in public cloud 2508, i have a question, which is very basic, can i use one chart of depreciation for two company codes, or is there any option of creating separate chart of depreciation and then assign it to respective company codes.

I know in Rise with SAP, we can either create two different chart of depreciations for two different company codes, and one chart of dep can be mapped to N number of company codes.

Your reply would be highly appreciated.

 

BR

Muhammad Yousuf Ali

SAP FI Consultant

entry.title: Adaptation in SAP Standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Good afternoon, I am trying to edit a field in SAP Public Cloud using Adapt UI. I have tried this in other applications and it has worked for me, exactly the same way: first modify the header text and then the fields in the entry.

After reading the SAP documentation, I found the paragraph attached here.

I’ve changed a UI element, but the change is not applied everywher

"UI elements that you change in one place might not be changed in all other places where they are used. For example, if you rename a label, it's not changed everywhere in the app, and you must rename each occurrence individually.

Also, if you make changes in edit mode of the app, they might not be visible in display mode, and vice versa. If your change is visible only in one mode, make the change also in the other (by toggling between adaptation and navigation mode as described above)."

I'm in the app "Manage Supplier Line Items", as you can see in the screenshot, I have changed the journal entry field in the header, and you can see the change “Invoice date,” but I can't change it in the item field because when I edit it, it already appears with the header name, unlike in other apps that have the standard name and allow you to change it on both sides.

Is this an error in the application? Am I missing something?


Best regards.

Juan Antonio

entry.title: Disable custom action button when a field value changed in SAP Fiori Elements
entry.content:
I have a custom action implemented in manifest.json

 "_Attachment/@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.LineItem": {
   "actions": {
     "idUploadAtt": {
       "press": ".extension.xxx.ext.controller.ObjectPage.onAttachmentUpload",
       "visible": true,
       "enabled": ".extension.xxx.ext.controller.ObjectPage.onAttachmentUploadEnable",
       "requiresSelection": false,
       "text": "Add a Link"
     }
   }
 }

i have the handler implemented in the controller extension. 

I need the custom action button dynamically enable/disable based from one of the field values in the object page. If value is blank, custom action button is disabled and vice versa.

However, I checked that the handler in the controller extension is only triggered during routing to the object page or changing to edit mode. It does not trigger when the field value is changed.

Can you advise how can I trigger the handler during field value change?

entry.title: No Data Returned in CDS I_MfgOrderActlPlanTgtLdgrCost After Filling Parameters (Production Order Cos
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I hope you are doing well.

I am currently working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, and I am trying to build a production cost analysis in Power BI using CDS views as the data source.

My objective is to analyze production order costs by activity, such as:

  • Labor hours (man-hours)

  • Machine hours

  • Utility-related costs (energy, water, etc.)

  • Actual vs planned/target costs associated with manufacturing or process orders

The goal is to extract this information via a CDS view and consume it in Power BI.

At the moment, I am using the CDS view:

  • I_MfgOrderActlPlanTgtLdgrCost

When I try to preview this CDS, the system requires the following parameters:

  • Ledger

  • Fiscal Year Period From

  • Fiscal Year Period To

  • Currency Role

Even after entering valid values for all these parameters, no data is returned in the preview.

Because of this behavior, I am not sure whether:

  • This CDS requires additional CO configuration (e.g. settlement, period-end closing, or cost posting prerequisites),

  • The parameters (ledger, fiscal year/period, or currency role) must be provided in a specific way,

  • Or if this CDS is not intended to be consumed directly for detailed production order cost analysis.

My questions are:

  1. Has anyone successfully used I_MfgOrderActlPlanTgtLdgrCost and faced a similar issue with no data returned?

  2. Are there any known prerequisites (e.g. cost postings, activity confirmations, period-end processes) required for this CDS to return data?

  3. Are there alternative CDS views recommended to analyze costs associated with production or process orders, especially with a breakdown by activities (labor, machine) and cost components?

Any guidance, experience, or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Sergio

entry.title: Planned Independent Requirements for determining targt stock do not exist
entry.content:
Hello,

I am running the script Replenishment Planning for Stores (3I7_MX).

This is the process I followed according to the documentation.

1.Select MRP type RF.

2.Select de Strategy Group 40.

 

3.The PIRS has been created.

4.However, when running the rapid replenishment.

The system displays the following error message: Planned Independent Requirements for determining targt stock do not exist.

 

Can you help me figure out why this is happening?
I've moved some other data, but I'm still getting the same error message.

Thanks.

entry.title: Automatic Population of Billing Header Custom Field from Billing Type (Before Save)
entry.content:
Need guidance on how to automatically populate a Billing Document Header Custom Field with the Billing Type value during billing document creation.

Requirement:

  • Billing Type: G2 – Credit Memo, Custom Field (Header level): Billing Type – G2, the custom field should be automatically populated from the Billing Document Header and the value must be fetched before the billing document is saved, without any manual input.

  1. Is there any BAdI or custom logic available to populate header-level custom fields in the billing document?

  2. Which business context should be used to achieve this requirement?

  3. Is it possible to implement this logic so that the value is determined prior to the billing document save?

entry.title: Item 000010 requires exactly 10 serial numbers for the assetMessage no. IO206
entry.content: Item 000010 requires exactly 10 serial numbers for the assetMessage no. IO206 I am getting this error when i am trying to do consignment fillup delivery.

entry.title: Need to print the delivery document partner address in Shipping Instruction custom Adobe form
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Good Day.

We have a requirement to display the carrier partner address related to the delivery document in a custom Adobe form. However, the CDS view I_DeliveryDocumentPartner is not released, so we are unable to use it for this requirement.

Could you please suggest an alternate released CDS view that can be used to retrieve delivery partner data (specifically carrier partner details) and display it in the custom output form?

Your guidance on this would be greatly appreciated.T

hanks in advance.

entry.title: Manage Safety Instructions for Equipment in Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
In application Manage Safety Instructions for Equipment(F4425) I can't find any Location or Equipment. 

I have managed Locations in App Manage Locations and Created a location with technical object reference and also Imported location from PM. 

For example in App Manage Risk Assessments, Locations and equipment works fine.

I have right roles assigned, integration with PM is activated.

What may be the issue?

entry.title: Missing Documents in My Inbox
entry.content:
Good day, 

I am having issues with approval process. I have checked all the requirements in terms of business roles and business catalogs of the users. But there are documents where it would not notify the approver and would not appear in the My Inbox app.

(1) When I check the document, the status is "In Approval" and in the approval details section of the item it says "Ready", but it did not notify the approver, and it didn't appear in the My Inbox app. 

(2) There are also times when the documents that were sent for approval would disappear in the My Inbox if not processed immediately. 

May I know the possible reason for this and the solution for the issues.

entry.title: IBAN Validation Error: “Account number xxxx in the IBAN is incorrect”
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are facing an issue in S/4HANA (Vendor Master / BP – Vendor role) while maintaining bank details for vendors.

Error message: “Account number … in the IBAN is incorrect”

However, the IBAN entered is correct and verified.

Additionally, the system also displays : “Account checksum is not checked”

The checkbox for bank data is active in FI, and the bank account check works correctly for thousands of vendors. This issue has occurred for two different vendors, so it does not appear to be a one-off data entry problem.

Solution proposed:  Deactivate the "Bank Data" checkbox and skipping the validation. 

However, are there alternatives?

Thanks

entry.content:

best regards

entry.title: Exporting PIRs from MD62/MD63 to Exce
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I’m trying to export the PIRs from MD62/MD63 to an Excel file, but I haven’t found a way to do it yet. I have already tried using transaction MD79, but the issue is that it only allows exporting one material at a time. There’s no option to select multiple materials or an entire product family.

Is there a way to export all PIRs at once to Excel?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: PR Re-Approval After Deletion
entry.content:
Dear All,

In flexible workflow, In the case where a Purchase Requisition (PR) has already been approved, is it possible to cancel it by deleting the PR item and have the system trigger the approval workflow again?

Regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Down payment paid in legacy system SAP S4HANA cloud
entry.content:
Hi All,

I would like to ask for suggestions in case of migrating supplier/vendor down payments to SAP S4HANA cloud. In terms of SAP S4HANA cloud, vendor down payments as special GL indicator items are not supported in migration cockpit app, which means that they can not be migrated and have to be entered manually. I have found two approaches on how to get these items into S4 depending on whether the advance payment was already made in legacy system or it will be posted in new system (S4).

1. If no payment is present in legacy system the process is to:

-post the vendor down payment request in S4

-book payment in S4

-after invoice is posted, clear both in S4

 

2. now if the payment is already posted in legacy system the workaround might be to reclassify the supplier down payment as vendor credit memo to be able to clear this item with final invoice once it is posted in S4. 

 

Does anyone have an experience with option 2? What is the best practice in such a case? Is the described workaround valid?

Thanks in advance for your help

Zuzana Gersiova
